text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
Valiant Express - (built 1988) 29,998 dwt sold to U.S. buyers for $18 million.
Nordfarer - (built 1988) 29,999 dwt and sistership Nordfast - (built 1987) 29,998 dwt sold to U.S. based buyers for $38 million en-bloc.
Lublin II - (built 1987) 13,593 dwt sold to Indian buyers for $4 million.
Buxmoon - (built 1985) 12,622 dwt sold for for $12.7 million including timecharter attached until August 1998 at $11,150 daily.
Armada Trader - (built 1990) 10,345 dwt sold within the Netherlands for $11.2 million.
Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to survey, inspection or other conditions.
